sentences.english: You will be responsible for any problem, because you do not listen to our well-intentioned words.
sentences.chinese: 我们好言相劝你偏不听，出什么差错你自己负责。

sentences.english: You understand it will be late to counsel them or pray.
sentences.chinese: 那时所有的相劝与祈祷都晚矣。

sentences.english: It will be late to counsel then pray.
sentences.chinese: 到那时再相劝或祈祷依然迟矣。

sentences.english: The mother coaxes the daughter out of go to the party alone.
sentences.chinese: 母亲好言相劝，不让女儿独自去参加聚会。

sentences.english: Many friends and family are struggling to persuade, but Liu declined.
sentences.chinese: 很多亲朋好友都苦苦相劝，但小刘谢绝了。
